Item.Value: Oh... hello. I don't think I've seen your face before, are you new to town? Yes, you must be. Well, my name is $0$, I'm $1$'s aunt.
You seem to be in a rush, don't let me keep you. I hope you have a good day.
Hello, $^$. Could you talk to $1$ for me by any chance? I worry about her, always pushing herself so hard.
For me? Oh, $^$, you shouldn't have.
$1$... I wish you'd listen to me. You push yourself too hard.
Ready for what? I know you're skilled with that sword of yours, but every time you leave the house with it, I'm so afraid.
